import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Rating, TextArea } from 'semantic-ui-react' class FormPlant extends Component { state = { nickname: "", commonName: "", scientificName: "", temp: "", tempTol: "", humid: "", humidTol: "", lightExpo: "", lightTol: "", difficultyRating: "", toxic: false, notes: "", searchTerm: "" } componentDidMount() { } handleChange = ev => { console.log(ev.target, ev.target.value) this.setState({ [ev.target.name]: ev.target.value }) } handleRating = (ev, {rating}) => { console.log(ev.target, rating) this.setState({ difficultyRating: rating }) } toggleCheckbox = (ev) => { console.log(ev.target) this.setState(prevState => {toxic: !prevState.toxic}) } render() { return (
